mapper.select: select * from admin_db order by a_idx asc
mapper.insert: insert into admin_db (a_idx, a_id, a_pw, a_na, a_pho, a_em, a_stat, a_log) values (#{a_idx}, #{a_id}, #{a_pw}, #{a_na}, #{a_pho}, #{a_em}, #{a_stat}, #{a_log})
mapper.update: update admin_db set a_pw = #{a_pw}, a_na = #{a_na}, a_pho = #{a_pho}, a_em = #{a_em}, a_stat = #{a_stat}, a_log = #{a_log} where a_idx = #{a_idx}
